KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Acknowledgement Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A check based on an acknowledgement

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Hold Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to the Hold Service.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Deadline Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to the ATP Service for the end of a Milestone.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Time Period Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to the ATP Service for the date range of a Milestone.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Start Date Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to the ATP Service for the start of a Milestone.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Process Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check that depends on another Process in the Process Service.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Direct Rule Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check based on a known or nameable rule (Agenda).

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Indirect Rule Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to some logic (rule) to determine another rule to eveluate.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Equal Value Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to determine if a value is equal to the value specified in the Check.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Maximum Value Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to determine if a value is equal to or less than the value specified in the Check.

KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.NAME: Minimum Value Check
KSEN_CHECK_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A Check to determine if a value is equal to or greater than the value specified in the Check.
